name: Hot Face
baseMeaning: A yellow face with flushed cheeks, sweat drops, and tongue sticking out from heat.
tldr: Shows being hot/overheated OR finding something/someone extremely attractive.

contextMeanings.meaning: Being hot from weather or temperature.
Finding someone or something extremely attractive.
Exaggerated reaction to minor heat or attraction.
